meanings.definition: Lack of agreement or harmony; conflict.
meanings.sent1: The discords between the two friends led to a big argument.
meanings.sent2: The discords in the team caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent3: The discords over which movie to watch resulted in a game of rock-paper-scissors.
meanings.sent4: The discords in their opinions created a storm of disagreement.
meanings.sent5: The discords in the family were finally resolved through open communication.

meanings.definition: A combination of musical sounds that clash.
meanings.sent1: The music piece had beautiful harmonies interrupted by sudden discords.
meanings.sent2: The composer intentionally included discords to create tension in the song.
meanings.sent3: The discords in the melody added an unexpected twist to the performance.
meanings.sent4: The discords in the music mirrored the chaos of the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The sudden discords in the song caught the audience's attention.
